modName: Dark DragonScale and Dragonbone Armor Stealthy
summary: Make dragonscale and dragonbone armor much darker and scarier than the original.
descriptionHtml:
For a FULL tutorial on how I created this mod go check out my YouTube Channel.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p02NysXwV5U


*Updated to work for female characters*

I basically tinted the original armor to make it a bit more scary and dark. I feel as if the original texture was almost comical.
----------------------------------------

Installation:
Method 1.
(Extract) DarkDragonArmor.zip into the skyrim data folder.

Method 2.

(Extract all files and place them here)
\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\"

============================================================
author: Regaz93
